derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French viscous or late Latin viscosus, from Latin viscum 'birdlime'

entry.def: A viscous liquid is thick and sticky.

means.word_mean: 1. having a relatively high resistance to flow
